src:
Sah! Suryo Utomo Jadi Dirjen Pajak
01 Nov 2019, 02:00 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati melantik Suryo Utomo sebagai Direktur Jenderal (Dirjen) Pajak yang baru. Ia menggantikan Robert Pakpahan yang masuk masa pensiun.Suryo Utomo sebelumnya merupakan Staf Ahli Bidang Kepatuhan Pajak.Pelantikan Dijen Pajak berlangsung di Aula Mezzanine, Kementerian Keuangan (Kemenkeu) Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019). Selain melantik Dirjen Pajak yang baru, Sri Mulyani melantik beberapa pejabat lain."Pada hari ini Jumat 1 November 2019 saya Menteri Keuangan dengan ini resmi melantik pejabat yang baru di Kementerian Keuangan," kata Sri Mulyani membacakan naskah pelantikan.Sri Mulyani percaya pejabat yang dilantik mampu melaksanakan tugas dengan sebaik-baiknya."Saya percaya saudara-saudara akan melaksanakan tugas sebaik-baiknya sesuai dengan tanggung jawab yang diberikan," katanya.Setelah itu, pejabat yang dilantik mengucap sumpah yang dipandu Sri Mulyani. Lalu, melakukan penandatangan berita acara. Simak Video "Gaya Cool Dirjen Pajak Saat Mengisi Kuliah Umum di UI"[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/eds)
text:
Legitimate! Suryo Utomo Becomes Director General of Taxes
Nov 01 2019, 2:00 AM by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati has installed Suryo Utomo as the new Director General (Dirjen) of Taxes. He replaces Robert Pakpahan who retired .uryo Utomo was previously an Expert Staff in Tax Compliance. The Tax Inauguration inauguration took place in the Mezzanine Hall, Ministry of Finance (Ministry of Finance), Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). In addition to inaugurating the new Director General of Tax, Sri Mulyani inaugurated several other officials. "On Friday, November 1, 2019, I am the Minister of Finance hereby officially inaugurating a new official at the Ministry of Finance," Sri Mulyani said reading the inauguration script. "I believe the brothers will carry out their duties in the best way in accordance with the responsibilities given," he said. After that, officials who were sworn in took the oath guided by Sri Mulyani. Then, sign the minutes. Check out the video "Cool style of the Director General of Taxes when filling public lectures at UI" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (eds / eds)
